channel.title: Removing HP count above head whilst pking
channel.description:
Hey, they is my first time tackling a client for my server on my own. I know just about nothing about client at the moment, so I need to know how to remove the HP count above your head when you are attacked. This is what I'm talking about:
[img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/8258/hppic.png[/img]
How do I remove that?
